data.name: Spoockey
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord!


About the Game

SPOOCKEY is an arcade game that combines the block breaker game genre with the pace and feel of real life air hockey and some forbidden magics to create quick, thrilling PvP matches where nothing is set in stone until the very end.

Features

  • PvP air hockey-like gameplay with paddles and teleports
  • Compete online against randos with matchmaking
  • Challenge your friends from lobbies
  • It turns any day into Halloween (careful with that hot PSL!)
  • more coming in future updates...

Keep an eye out and keep a cool head because it's air hockey, it's spooky... it's SPOOCKEY!!

data.short_description: Who cares about Christmas! We wanted Halloween all year long, so we made SPOOCKEY, a competitive multiplayer air hockey/block break mashup to satisfy your creepy cravings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
